fields.name: ActivationState
fields.description: Activation state of the partner topic.

fields.name: EventTypeInfo
fields.description: Event Type information from the corresponding event channel.

fields.name: ExpirationTimeIfNotActivatedUtc
fields.description:
Expiration time of the partner topic. If this timer expires while the partner topic is still never activated,
the partner topic and corresponding event channel are deleted.

fields.name: MessageForActivation
fields.description: Context or helpful message that can be used during the approval process by the subscriber.

fields.name: PartnerRegistrationImmutableId
fields.description: The immutableId of the corresponding partner registration.

fields.name: PartnerTopicFriendlyDescription
fields.description:
Friendly description about the topic. This can be set by the publisher/partner to show custom description for the customer partner topic.
This will be helpful to remove any ambiguity of the origin of creation of the partner topic for the customer.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Provisioning state of the partner topic.

fields.name: Source
fields.description: Source associated with this partner topic. This represents a unique partner resource.
